resources.string: Access Key No Longer Usable in Flipcash
Your Access Key has initiated an unlock. As a result, you will no longer be able to use this Access Key in Flipcash
Only accounts created through Flipcash are currently supported
For a limited time new accounts will receive a free welcome bonus of $20 of stablecoins
Pay %1$s to create your Flipcash account
You\'re currently logged into an account
Please ensure you have saved your Access Key before proceeding. Would you like to logout and login with a new account?
Something went wrong during payment. Please try again later
Tap the Google Lens icon to open the QR code to log into Flipcash. Alternatively you can log in manually by entering the 12 words in the Flipcash Log In screen.
Warning! This image gives access to all the funds you have in Flipcash. Do not share this image with anyone else. Keep it secure and safe.
You do not have enough funds to complete this transaction. You can deposit more funds in Settings
Flipcash is designed for small, every day transactions. Your daily give limit will increase tomorrow
You can only give up to %1$s
Flipcash is designed for small, every day transactions. Your daily send limit will increase tomorrow
Failed to create a cashlink. Please try again
Failed to restore selected account. Please try again
Your camera is used to grab Digital Cash. Please allow access to the camera to proceed
Please allow Push Notifications to get notified when you receive cash
Flipcash enables you to grab the digital cash displayed on another user\'s phone by pointing your camera at it
You need to allow camera access to be able to grab Digital Cash
We were unable to cancel your transfer. Please try again
The money will be returned to your wallet
This cash was already collected by someone else.
Something went wrong. The cash could not be collected
Nothing Cooking in the Lab Right Now
Check back in the next app update.
This will permanently delete your Flipcash account
We were unable to log you out. Please try again
We were unable to delete your Flipcash account. Please try again
Deposit funds into your wallet by sending USDC to your Deposit Address below. Tap to copy.
Your Access Key will grant access to your Flipcash account. Keep it private and safe.
Scan this QR code with your phone\'s camera to download the Flipcash app
Where would you like to withdraw your USDC to?

Destination Account Not Initialized\nPlease make sure the address you’re withdrawing to has been initialized by your wallet provider. A quick way to do this is to make sure there is already some USDC in the address you’re trying to withdraw to
Your withdrawal has been processed. It may take a few minutes for your funds to show up in your destination wallet
